feed.title: Google Cloud: Cloud Life Sciences
feed.subtitle: Changelog for Google Cloud product: Cloud Life Sciences

entry.content:
As of July 8, 2025, Cloud Life Sciences is beginning to shut down.
Batch is generally available and is a comprehensive successor that supports all use cases for Cloud Life Sciences. Learn how to [migrate to Batch](https://cloud.google.com/batch/docs/migrate-to-batch-from-cloud-life-sciences).
entry.summary: Cloud Life Sciences is being shut down on July 8, 2025. Batch is a fully-featured successor and supports all Cloud Life Sciences use cases. Instructions on migrating to Batch are available.
entry.title: Deprecated: Cloud Life Sciences is shutting down
